document.full_text: a tornado touched down in heavily populated western massachusetts on wednesday, causing widespread damage, authorities said, as the northeast braced for a barrage of thunderstorms, hail and high winds.
document.title: tornadoes touch down in western massachusetts
lines_and_colors: a tornado touched down in heavily populated western massachusetts on wednesday, causing widespread damage, authorities said, as the northeast braced for a barrage of thunderstorms, hail and high winds.
